::KitKat::

She looked up at Death and nodded. "Yes, do what you must." She 
looked at Destructor. "I was a fool." She stood up. She was extremely 
mad at herself for not realizing. For letting her soft side undermine 
her better judgement. For thinking that there ever was such a thing 
as friends and true loyal followers. She looked at Destructor. "Do 
the backround on the others. I want everything checked.  I may not be 
perfect, but I won't make the same mistake twice."  She looked at 
Death. "Kill the little things. Kill then make sure they do not come 
back. Get rid of each and every one of those spiders." Her voice 
filled with anger, hatred and hurt.  She felt completely betrayed.  
She didn't ever want that feeling again.  And from now on, she wasn't 
going to take chances. She looked at Destructor. "Please show me what 
you had accomplished with the replicators. I have that project to 
finish."
